home.AutoHotkey: AutoHotkey is a free, open-source scripting language for Windows that allows users to easily create small to complex scripts for all kinds of tasks such as: form fillers, auto-clicking, macros, etc..
home.stepDownload: If you haven't done so yet, download autohotkey from its official website. And follow the steps until you install it successfully.
home.stepCreate: Now is the time to create your shortcuts! Use the generator below to add the description of your shortcut, then the trigger that will trigger the action, and finally what you want to happen. When finished, press the button to create the hotkey. You can add as many hotkeys as you want. When finished, press the button to generate and download your AHK file
home.stepRunAutomatically:
To run your hotkeys you just have to double-click on the file you created. But doing that every time you start the computer would be unproductive! Therefore, we are going to configure it to start automatically.

The first thing you should do is create a shortcut to the ahk file that you created earlier, with all your shortcuts. For this, right click on the file and press "create direct access ".

For windows 11 or windows 10, press the Windows key together with the letter R key ( âŒ˜ + R ). The "run " window will open where you must write "shell: startup " (without the quotes). That in turn will open a file manager window, where you must place the shortcut to your hotkey file. Cut the shortcut you created earlier, and paste it into the folder that opened.
home.stepReady:
Your shortcuts are ready! And you can have as many shortcuts and hotkeys running as you want! There are never too many!
Remember that if you download a new file of hotkeys to update them, you must repeat step 3 again. To make sure that those hotkeys will also run automatically every time you start Computer.

navbarText.label: One minute saved every hour, that's 146 hours a year

swal.title: It's true, look!
swal.html:
1 minute every hour * 24 hours a day = 24 minutes
* 365 days a year = 8,760 minutes
/ 60 minutes every hour = 146 hours

CarouselMessages.keyboard: Customize your keyboard to reconfigure it as you see fit!

ideas.1: Want some great ideas for shortcuts and shorteners?
ideas.2: We have many for you, click here!

CarouselMessages.openPage: Add a hotkey to open this page and your .ahk file So you can add more shortcuts whenever you need!
CarouselMessages.email: Create shorteners for texts that you use frequently, like your email or full name
CarouselMessages.program: Assign key combinations to open your frequent programs and web pages

text.description: The event will be fired when you type the word or phrase and then a <scrollEndingCharacters> final character</scrollEndingCharacters>, such as a semicolon.

press.description: Click on the area to write and simultaneously press the keys you want to use as hotkey

change.description: Change the trigger text to other text. You could create a shortener to write your email!

write.description: The text you choose will be written automatically

MsgBox.description: A small informative pop-up window will open, with the text of your choice

webpage.description: The URL you type will open in your default browser in a new tab

program.description: Don't you know what the exact path and name of the program is? <scrollPath>Read the frequently asked questions and learn how!</scrollPath>

click.description: A click will be made in the position where the cursor is at that moment

click_double.description: A double-click will be made in the position where the cursor is at that moment

cursor_0.description: Press the button to start the detection and then move the cursor to the point you want and click

cursor.description: Press the button to start the detection and then move the cursor to the point you want and click

cursor_right.optionDescription: Move the cursor and right click on
cursor_right.description: Press the button to start the detection and then move the cursor to the point you want and click

cursor_double.description: Press the button to start the detection and then move the cursor to the point you want and click

generator.swalDeleteHotkeyQuestion: Are you sure to delete this hotkey?

Generating an empty file will not do at all ðŸ˜…
Create some useful hotkeys and then generate the file
generateFile.footer:
Do you need help to generate your first hotkey?

firstHotkey.title: You created your first file in {{productName}}!
firstHotkey.body:
Double-click on the file that was generated for you, and test your new hotkeys.

Do you see how easy and fast it is?

You can add as many shortcuts and shorteners as you need. And continuing with the following steps you can configure your file to run automatically when you start the computer.

With autohotkey, in addition to the current actions in {{productName}} you can also:

  • read information from documents, such as excel, and integrate it into your hotkeys
  • Interact with web page elements from your own browser
  • Create different actions depending on the program you are in

    • We are constantly working on adding new functions, activators and actions
    So imagine all the future possibilities!

path_and_name_of_programs.title: How to know the path and name of a program?

list.1: Click on the window icon and in the search bar write the name of the program
list.2: Then right click on the program and select "Open file location"
list.3: A file explorer window will open, with direct access to the selected program. Make right click on it and select the option "Properties"
list.4: In the "Shortcut" tab, copy the content inside the "Destination" option. That contains the path and name of the program.

ending_characters.title: What are final characters and what are they?
ending_characters.quote: Unless the <scroll>asterisk option</scroll> is in effect, you must type a trailing character after the abbreviation of an active string to activate it. The final characters initially consist of the following:

asterisk_option.title: What is the asterisk option?
asterisk_option.text: The asterisk option allows that a trailing character is not needed to activate an abbreviation. Whenever the word or phrase is detected, the chosen action will be activated.

contact.title: Can't find the activator or action you need? Let us know and we will add it!

bottom.by: by and for lovers of productivity

developing.title: Ush, functionality in development!
developing.body:
We are working hard to add more and more great features. So don't worry, it will be available very soon!

We have many plans for the future, you can see some of them from the future updates section.

Autohotkey Generator is developed by an independent team, so we need your help to continue growing.

You can support us by buymeacoffee.com, where we upload exclusive content for our sponsors .

You can also follow us on twitter Each tweet mentioning us adds a lot!

newsletterForm.label: Subscribe to the email newsletter
newsletterForm.subtitle: So we will keep you informed of new updates. But don't worry, we won't send excessive mail or spam.

modal.title: Email newsletter
modal.body: We are constantly adding new functions and amazing features. Stay up-to-date with {{productName}} news!

updates.title: Future updates
updates.subtitle:
These are our future plans for {{productName}}!

If you want to keep up to date with releases and updates subscribe to the email newsletter.

edition.title: Hotkey edition
edition.description: Edit your created hotkeys without writing them again

accounts.title: User accounts
accounts.description: Store all your created hotkeys in your personal account, then you can edit or delete them from there

multiplesActions.title: Multiple actions for the same activator
multiplesActions.description: Add more than one action for the same shortcut or hotkey

activeWindow.title: activators according to the active window
activeWindow.description: Create global hotkeys and also specific hotkeys for each program

iterations.title: Loops and iterations
iterations.description: Go through each of the rows of an excel file and integrate it into your activators and actions

desktop.title: Desktop application
desktop.description: Never again will you have to download your AHK files and configure them yourself! Manage everything from the desktop application

browser.title: Automate your interaction with the browser
browser.description: Create routines, shortcuts and loops to interact with different elements on web pages

updates.footer:
The future of {{productName}} is exceptional! Right?

But for all this to be possible we need a solid community of productivity lovers to join us

You can follow us on twitter and sponsor us from buymeacoffee

resources.react: The {{productName}} website is built with the open source Javascript library "React" y comenzo con un poderoso "create-react-app".
resources.i18n: Select the language you prefer! Thanks to react-i18next we implement the multilanguage system easily
resources.bootstrap: The initial design template is built with the bootstrap library as a base, making use of react-bootstrap for access via react
resources.autohotkey: All activators and actions work thanks to the windows program Autohotkey. And the templates for its creation are based on the official documentation.
resources.craco: The code routes of the web are ordered and are structured and scalable thanks to craco and its customizable routes.
resources.animista: The animations and transitions are developed based on CSS code provided by animista
resources.select: Selector design and functionality courtesy of react-select
resources.sass: The stylesheets are developed in SCSS interpreted by sass
resources.sweetalert2: The confirmation, warning and error popup messages are created with sweetalert2
resources.freepik: Some images and vectors used are courtesy of the Freepik copyright free image bank
resources.pixabay: The sound effects, as well as some images are courtesy of the bank of images and sounds free of copyright pixabay
resources.termsfeed: The terms and conditions of use of {{productName}} were provided free of charge by Termsfeed from its official website

You can support us by buymeacoffee.com, where we upload exclusive content for our sponsors.
